mapper.select: SELECT wi.WORK_INFO_SEQ as workInfoSeq, wi.USER_SEQ as userSeq, wi.WORK_INFO as workInfo, wi.MOD_DT as modDt, wi.MOD_ID as modId, wi.REG_DT as regDt, wi.REG_ID as regId FROM work_info wi where DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(wi.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_info (USER_SEQ, WORK_INFO, REG_DT, REG_ID ) VALUE (#{userSeq}, #{workInfo}, now(), #{reg_id})
